summary: This is a basic recolor of the Thalmor Robes, from the standard to a ash color and silver lining.
descriptionHtml:
These robes work for both male and female!!

To install manually
Unzip files 
Place in the folder: Data\\textures\\clothes\\thalmor
Load up game, enjoy!

Please feel free to let me know what you think, if you guys have any other color suggestions feel free to post them. I hope you enjoy this and find it useful in the game.

This recolor effects: Gloves/Boots/Hooded and Unhooded robes
author: swggeekgirl
